We focus on meeting the unique needs, and aim to exceed the expectations, of each client and are committed to providing comprehensive after-sales service and support.

SG has focused on building a world-class Structured Products platform for the past 20 years.

Each of our Structured Products reflects the comprehensive capabilities and experience in the Structured Products business, including current analytical, engineering, economic and risk analysis as well as consideration of legal & regulatory parameters.

Their broad platform, extensive market experience and structuring capabilities have been acknowledged as being among the best in the industry and enable to offer clients the following KEY PLUS FACTORS: -A comprehensive range of innovative structures -Access to one of the largest investment universes, in terms of underlying assets
